AF Attribute Name:
Pen n, Penn, Pn, Pen 0n, Pen0n, P0n
(n = 1 to 9)
i.e. (Pen 1, Pen 02, Pen3, Pen04, P05)

Pen n, Penn, Pn, Pen 0n, Pen0n, P0n + Color
I.e. (Pen 1 Color, Pen02Color)
Valid Values: Black, Blue, Brown, Gray, Grey, Green, Orange, Pink, Red, Yellow, Violet, Purple

AF Attribute Name:
Pen n, Penn, Pn, Pen 0n, Pen0n, P0n + MinimumYAxis
I.e. (Pen 1 MinimumYAxis, Pen02MinimumYAxis)

Pen n, Penn, Pn, Pen 0n, Pen0n, P0n + MaximumYAxis
I.e. (Pen 1 MaximumYAxis, Pen02MaximumYAxis)

Pen n, Penn, Pn, Pen 0n, Pen0n, P0n + Offset
I.e. (Pen 1 Offset, Pen02Offset)

Pen n, Penn, Pn, Pen 0n, Pen0n, P0n + Trend Type
I.e. (Pen 1 Trend Type, Pen02TrendType)
Valid Values: Interpolated, Step, Symbol, Interpolated + Symbol, Interpolated+Symbol, InterpolatedSymbol, Interpolated Symbol, Step + Symbol, Step+Symbol, StepSymbol, Step Symbol

AF Attribute Name: Trend Start Time, Trend Start Date, Trend Start, TrendStartTime, TrendStartDate, TrendStart, Start Time, Start Date, StartTime, StartDate
Valid Values: Relative Date (*-n Days) or Actual Date (6/12/2013 1:00:00)

AF Attribute Name: Trend End Time, Trend End Date, Trend End, TrendEndTime, TrendEndDate, TrendEnd, End Time, End Date, EndTime, EndDate
Valid Values: Relative Date (*-n Days) or Actual Date (6/12/2013 1:00:00)

AF Attribute Name: Min Y Axis, MinYAxis, Minimum Y Axis, MinimumYAxis
Max Y Axis, MaxYAxis, Maximum Y Axis, MaximumYAxis

Valid Values: Single, Single-Scale, SingleScale, Single Scale, Multi, Multi-Scale, MultiScale, Multi Scale
Auto-Scale, Auto-Scale, Auto, Multi Scale, Pen Min and Max Y Axis, Pen Min Max Y Axis, PenMinMaxYAxis, Trend Min and Max Y Axis, Trend Min Max Y Axis, TrendMinMaxYAxis
